actions.description: The githyanki makes three Greatsword attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage plus 17 (5d6) psychic damage.
actions.name: Greatsword

actions.description:
The githyanki casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 15):
At will: mage hand (the hand is invisible)

3/day each: blur, nondetection (self only)

1/day each: plane shift, telekinesis
actions.name: Spellcasting (Psionics)
